name: A Fishy Escape
description:
Controls - WASD (Or Arrow keys), X to attack, Space to Jump

Escape from the old king's castle!

This game is for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

In this game, you play as a fish in a randomly generated dungeon in a castle. There are random enemies with changing strengths, and your weapons also change randomly. All of these events depend on the rolls of 2 dice on the screen. When you defeat the king in his last room, you will be able to escape the castle!
